Name: Albina
Review Text: We ordered a peking soup (5€) half Peking duck (18,50€), Tjauw min met moksi meti special (9€) and paksoi (5,50€). The food was tasty, a bit greasy (just like it supposed to be) and really generous. One minor point is that they cut the duck …

Name: Albina
Review Text: Have been coming here for 18 years on a weekly basis. One of my favorite places in town. Cheap food and insane quality. Would definitely recommend!

Name: Albina
Review Text: Awesome suriname-chinese restaurant tasty, quick, reliable and reasonably priced! Would recommend for dutch-chinese food.

Name: Albina
Review Text: Beer was served in plastic cups. no decoration what so ever. worst food ever (not even the chips were freshly opened), everything seemed warmed for the 3th time. Hope i won't get sick.

Name: Albina
Review Text: I've discovered a new kitchen!! The Roti with fish was really good !

Name: Albina
Review Text: So delicious! Everything here is so nice. Recommend!

Name: Albina
Review Text: Fantastic food, decent pricing. Tausi Nau!

Name: Albina
Review Text: Amazing place! Lots of good food for a small price! Loved it!

Name: Albina
Review Text: I come here with my colleagues nearly every Friday and I always order dish #69, curry lamb with rice. The lamb is exceptionally done, juicy and tasty without being too greasy or salty. The staff is always very kind and polite. Oh, and did I mention it's also great value for money? Big thumbs up.

Name: Albina
Review Text: In the busy and crowded Amsterdam city center, there are places that dress in simple ways. You walk in, order some yummy food, eat it and leave. Don't stay there for hours to truly dine, focus on the meal and then go on your way to the next …

Name: Albina
Review Text: The food is very tasty and the portion is big. Well located and friendly service. The space itself could be a bit improved. Now it seems a "normal" house.. not a restaurant. Beside that, the food is very good indeed.

Name: Albina

Name: Albina
Review Text: For the style of food they are the best

Name: Albina
Review Text: .. luscious!, value for money 😋

Name: Albina
Review Text: As good as usual. All flavors are on their places, no additional oil. One of our favorite restaurants!

Name: Albina
Review Text: I love this place, every time I’m in Amsterdam I come here. Always great food, they pile your plate high. Lovely old ladies running the place. Food made with love, great prices. You must try it out.

Name: Albina
Review Text: My go to place in Amsterdam for Cha Sieuw because of its sauce. So recommended. Price wise, it’s very affordable (you get a relatively big portion too!). Location wise, you can reach it easily by tram and also Albert Cuypmarkt within a 1-minute walking distance!

Name: Albina
Review Text: Tasty, super quick and cheap.  I recommend the moksi meti (meat mix)

Name: Albina
Review Text:
Excellent Surinese food at highly affordable prices, roughly €8 a main course.
If you've not tried Surinese food before I strongly suggest going for a moksi Meti. It's basically  four roast meats including chicken, pork, duck and sausage …

Name: Albina
Review Text: My go-to Chinese surinamese restaurant for years: great food at very reasonable prices, and such a friendly service! Their vegetarian dishes are a must try for vegetarians + anyone who wants to vary their protein consumption

Name: Albina
Review Text: Despite the utilitarian looks Albina is one of the nicest restaurants in town. There are a lot  of regulars. The food is simple but plenty and great. …

Name: Albina
Review Text: I had the Surinamese roasted chicken with noodles.. Excellent taste and very affordable pricing! Really good quality and the staff were super kind! Would go back again..

Name: Albina
Review Text: Best take-out in the Pijp

Name: Albina
Review Text: One of the worst chinese restaraunts I have ever been to in my entire life. The chicken was old and the time that it was served made me feel like none of it was fresh. My wifes order came wrong and they tried to serve her what looked like a plate of vomit. Disgusting. I'd rather not eat for two days than to eat another meal from here.

Name: Albina

Name: Albina
Review Text: Great place. Super low key and family style. Meals are great and always super fast. Just a huge menu and sometimes it’s hard to choose

Name: Albina
Review Text: I was in Amsterdam for a short trip during a blustery, cold week of March. After a long day of meetings in a city that closes early, I was worried I'd have to go to bed hungry. Albina came to my rescue as a place that stays open until 10pm. …

Name: Albina
Review Text: The food here is excellent, inexpensive, and comes in enormous portions. I took a roti and could hardly finish half, much as I wanted to! …

Name: Albina
Review Text:
I love this restaurant!

But the bottom line is don't get a take away! …

Name: Albina
Review Text: No nonsense, great place to have a casual meal. Cheapest in the neighbourhood. Can recommend the Moksi meti (mixed meat dish) or roti chicken, for a hearty meal. Great service.

Name: Albina
Review Text: Great and affordable food in the centre of the city. Don't let the looks inside discourage you to eat here, the food is great, fast and relatively cheap compared to other places in the city.

Name: Albina
Review Text: My family is from Suriname and I was born in the USA.  I grew up on some of the best Surinamese dishes.  Albina is EXCELLENT Suriname food!  Pom is one of my favorite dishes and Albina does an AMAZING job with their Pom!

Name: Albina
Review Text: Albina is one of our staples when we go out in Amsterdam. You can find decent chinese/surinam food here, for an afforable price. The interior is a bit outdated, but there is enough seating place for large groups. The telo and saoto soup are recommended!

Name: Albina
Review Text: This is the best place in Amsterdam! I go there each week and the food is always tasty! Lovely staff and very quick orders!

Name: Albina
Review Text: The roast duck noodle soup is terrific, full of duck meat! The roast suckling pork with rice is heavenly! Definitely worth going back to.

Name: Albina
Review Text: If you are on a budget try the Chow Min Moksi meti or Fried Rice Moksi Meti. Chow min is a small thin noodle compared to the "spagetti" noodle. Moksi Meti just means Mixed Meat (Pork and chicken). You will get a lot of food for little money …

Name: Albina
Review Text: Nice food, however they weren't really aware of any allergenic information for my friend with a peanut allergy. Beware, there's peanut traces in the food!

Name: Albina
Review Text: The service is quick. The tjauw min was well prepared, although a bit dry. Their food is reasonably priced and portions are generous

Name: Albina
Review Text: If you want good Food from Suriname or China and a more then fair price, friendly staff near Albert Cuyp, Albina has been that place for more the 15 years

Name: Albina
Review Text: Don't let the lack of interior details fool you, this is s nice restaurant with really good food! Staff was friendly and the food was delivered quickly to our table!

Review Text:
